front.title: Session Initiation Protocol Extension for Response Integrity Check using Validation Cookie

abstract.t: This document defines an extension to the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP). This extension allows detection of stale responses and responses whose Via header (SIP [1]) have been modified. This memo suggests new processing rules at the proxy servers while forwarding requests and responses. The extension works by defining a new parameter which would be used to run an integrity check on received responses.
